name: Ahmed Yasin
story: While Ahmeds medical qualifications might not earn him any formal degrees, investigators can rely on his unshakable calm, steady hands, and vast arcane knowledge to stitch cuts, soothe burns, and reattach severed limbs. Ahmeds fascination with ancient occult

levels.description: At the end of your turn, you may heal 1 stress OR wound on an investigator in your space (it may be yourself)
Instead, heal 2 in any combination of stress and wounds
Heal 2 stress AND 2 wounds on EACH investigator in your space
